title: SCI-FI LEVELS 2 (Music Loops for level design)
description: Welcome To SCI-FI LEVELS 2 Game Developer & Production Music Pack! (Music Loops for level design)
longDescription:
The Second instalment of Sci-Fi Levels brings you a pack that has been crafted for menu style music & in-game level music, screen titles/background music for your Unreal Project. All of the music has been produced in the Key of 'D Minor' for seamless and smooth music transitions between your level designs/developments during gameplay.

🎮

PURCHASES & FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

  • When You Buy our products they are formatted in WAV audio files. Customers have enquired about other formats such as MP3 to which are not available.
  • All Music is downloaded directly from the UNREAL ASSET STORE after Purchase.
  • When we submit to UNREAL ENGINE MARKETPLACE our products are packaged as WAV/CUE
  • See TECHNICAL INFORMATION for more details about our products before buying.

🎮

LISTEN TO SCI-FI-LEVELS 2 HERE : https://soundcloud.com/jordan-caygill/sci-fi-levels-2-preview/s-oo6TyD58iMq
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  All music in the key of 'D Minor' for seamless/Smooth audio transitions between levels in your game
  •  Tempo/BPM 90
  •  Music Loops crafted in a SCI-FI Style for level design/gameplay, Mixed & Mastered/HD Audio

Number of Audio Wavs: 10

Number of Audio Cues: 10

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 42 minutes 55 seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://soundcloud.com/jordan-caygill/sci-fi-levels-2-preview/s-oo6TyD58iMq

Important/Additional Notes: Please Email us for customer enquires & additional questions related to our products.
